channel.title: Removing floor textures
channel.description:
Hey people, just stumbled across this whilst looking through my client :p this removes all floor textures and floor tiles shown on the minimap lel :p
Step 1.
Open class22.
Step 2.
search for [code]"flo.dat"[/code]
Step 3.
Comment out or remove the line containing flo.dat
Step 4.
Compile
Step 5.
Comment out any lines with errors :p
Step 6.
Load up your client and laugh :L
Credits: Me (MikeScott)
EDIT: I'm not posting pictures, so don't ask... All it is is a black floor and mini-map, surely you don't need to use much imagination for that...
